apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this romantic emoji depicts two people sharing a gentle kiss, rendered with Apple’s signature soft gradients and realistic lighting. The figures are subtly shaded with smooth, rounded edges, evoking a tender and affectionate moment between a woman and a person with light to medium-dark skin tone. Its use in digital communication universally signifies love, romance, and deep personal connection, beautifully expressed through Apple’s polished design.
